entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump From inside the White House, 11 secret service, Stephen Miller's wife and Pence's press secretary,  Trump's valet, all have #Covid19 and counting. And nothing about a better national testing strategy. WTF?
